flawed_nl_solution:
Fiona earns 40 hours/week * $20/hour = $<<40*20=800>>800/week
So she earns $800/week * 4 weeks/month = $3200/month
John earns 30 hours/week * $20/hour = $<<30*20=600>>600/week
So he earns $600/week * 4 weeks/month = $<<600*4=2400>>2400/month
Jeremy earns 25 hours * $20/hour = $<<25*20=5000>>5000/week
So he earns $5000/week * 4 weeks/month = $20000/month
Overall their boss has to spend $3200/month + $2400/month + $20000/month = $<<3200+2400+20000=25600>>25600/month
#### 25600

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 500, not 5000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
